questionTitle: I'm going to get a new car; I'm tired ________ having to take this one to the garage to get it repaired all the time.
________ a computer can help you work much faster.
I ________ be delighted to show you round the factory.
________ the wet weather, the football match went ahead.
She rang to make an early ________ at the hairdressers.
Mike was the ________ in his family; all his brothers were much taller.
Could you buy a cake please ________ John and Mary come this afternoon?
One ________ of public transport is its unreliability.
Did you know that Vanessa is ________ a baby?
The main ________ to progress is not technical but political.
The best rooms in that hotel ________ the bay.
The by-laws say that all dogs ________ be kept on a lead in the park.
Separate the eggs and then beat with a ________.
He was ________ to steal the money when he saw it lying on the table.
My father ________ me to learn English when I was a child, but never forced me.
We are accustomed ________ bad weather.
I was afraid ________ mentioning it to him.
I warned him ________ the danger, but he wouldn't listen to me.
Petrol is feared ________ in price this week.
I will ask him to come if I ________ him.
